sentence: Hi nkarhi lowu fanaka, Patrick Brown, profesa wa tikhemikhali ta swilo leswi hanyaka eXikolweni xa Vutshunguri xa Yunivhesiti ya Stanford, u sungule ku tsakela ku endla tindlela letintshwa to endla mepe wa swiaki swa xitekela.

sentence: Ku hlula loku ku endle leswaku Pep Guardiola, muleteri wa Barca la nga ni malembe ya 38 hi vukhale, a heta lembe rakwe ro sungula a ri murhangeri.
